name: Dreamland coffee
description: Du Qing, the heroine, opened a cafe in a foreign country alone after the adventure of Wonderland Lovers. A new story began when she took in a little boy who lingered outside her door on opening day...

name: R.O.O.T.
description: This story is about a corporation named RavenTech, set in the near future. R.O.O.T.

name: Mario Kart Zero
description: This is a hack of Mario Kart DS that changes the tracks to different ones. It also has custom music.

name: Vradark's Revenge
description: “Vradark's Revenge” is a fantasy game in the Action RPG genre.

name: Archer Hero Must Die
description: ‘Archer Hero Must Die' is a casual game. Players control an archer and defeat one powerful enemy after another.

name: Agni Fighter
description: Agni Fighter is a vertical scroll flight shooting game with future technology pictures. In the game, the player will control a fighter to fight over the city.

name: Kong Hero
description: ‘Kong Hero' is a 2D platform jumping game with cartoon style. The player controls a cute little monkey through many difficulties and finally reaches the destination.

name: Aeolus Fighter 2
description: 'Aeolus Fighter 2' is a vertical scroll flight shooting game. The player controls the main character's fighter to fight with the enemy in the universe.

name: Bingo Wackadoo Watch
description: Let’s play with Bluey, Bingo and the Wackadoo Watch! Cute wristwatch featuring Bingo includes eight digital clock faces, time tools and four games. Bluey and Bingo will guide you through games that include characters from the show. Bandit has wound Bingo up like a wind-up toy! Press the left and right buttons to help Bingo avoid obstacles that appear in the classroom. Bluey wants to play a game of keepy-uppy! At Hammerbarn, Bluey wants to buy the same thing as Bingo, or help Bluey keep a balloon off the ground by using the left and right buttons! Time tools include a stopwatch, timer and alarm. Wackadoo!

name: Dark Eden
description: It is a cancelled Nintendo Game Boy Advance games from Rival Dreams, a short-lived studio created by three employees at Acclaim. As one of the developers, Kynan Pearson, stated, they were highly influenced by Symphony of the Night and Metroid. You journey around a castle collecting four different power ups: the run, the wall jump, the fire sword, and the super jump. A prototype was released in Oct 2022. It is a metroiodvania style game, there is about 6 to 8 minutes of gameplay.

name: Bert's Family Feud: The Interactive DVD Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Video Ezy: In the Movies - Interactive DVD Trivia Game
description: Test your knowledge of movies past and present while you race, your family, friends, and the clock to become the ultimate movie trivia champion.

name: The Legend of Herobrine
description: The Legend of Herobrine is a mod designed for modern versions of Minecraft that aims to add Herobrine to the game with many new gameplay features while also fitting in with vanilla gameplay and keeping the scary theme surrounding Herobrine.

name: R3: The Art of Rocketry
description:
R3: The Art of Rocketry is a video game written by Bruce Webster for the Amiga released in 1995. It was a playable demo on the coverdisks of Amiga Power (issue 54) in October 1995 and on Amiga Format (issue 89) in September 1996.

The game was initially released as shareware, but the author later released the full game as freeware on Aminet in 2000. The registered version included Tritus from Davin Pearson, a three-player competitive Tetris-inspired game, much in the same manner of the game Super Foul Egg.

name: Just Dance 2014 Basic Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Avoid the Rain 2
description: This is an agile parkour game. You can dodge quickly to avoid raindrops falling from the sky and go to the designated place.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 14 - Collector's Edition
description: Help run Pinecreek Hills and Puerto Rico's Tropical Rainforest Parks

name: Sakura Trick
description: The story follows Haruka Takayama and her relationship with her highschool friends, especially Yuu Sonoda. What will happen to them now that they are second year students, and will they be able to continue to hide the relationship they share?

name: 2048 7x7
description: 2048 7x7 is another variant of the popular 2048 game. Here, it is played on a 7x7 grid and two new tiles are added each turn. Statistically speaking, this option should make it much easier to reach the tile with 2048 written on it.

name: Game, Game, Game, and again Game
description: Game, game, game and again game is a digital poem, retro-game, an anti-design statement and a personal exploration of the artist's changing worldview lens. Much of the western world's cultural surroundings, belief systems, and design-scapes, create the built illusion of clean lines and definitive choice, cold narrow pathways of five colors, three body sizes and encapsulated philosophy. Within net/new media art the techno-filter extends these straight lines into exacting geometries and smooth bit rates, the personal as WYSIWYG buttons. This game/artwork, while forever attached to these belief/design systems, attempts to re-introduce the hand-drawn, the messy and illogical, the human and personal creation into the digital, via a retro-game style interface, Hovering above and attached to the poorly drawn aesthetic is a personal examination of how we/I continually switch and un-switch our dominant belief systems. Moving from levels themed for faith or real estate, for chemistry or capitalism, the user triggers corrected poetry, jittering creatures and death and deathless noises. In addition each level contains short videos from the artist's childhood, representing those brief young interactions which spark out eventual beliefs. Game, game, game and again game is less a game about scoring and skill, and more an awkward and disjointed atmospheric, the self built into a jumping, rolling meander of life.

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021: Mercedes-Benz Remastered DLC
description: Mercedes-Benz Remastered includes 5 licensed Mercedes-Benz cars: Mercedes-Benz 300 SL Gullwing (W198), Mercedes-Benz 560 SEC (W126), Mercedes-Benz 500E (W124), Mercedes-Benz SLS AMG (C197), Mercedes-Benz 280 SL Pagoda (W113).

name: Not Born to be King
description: Not born to be King is a simulation game where you embody a medieval king and try to lead your kingdom to success. Face a large variety of events, build a strong economy, and make the right decisions to prosper in this ruthless world.

name: Eternal Fidelity
description: Evil people set a bee on the king's daughters. The princesses, enlisting the support of the court knight, will be saved. The knight's vow will not allow him to retreat and he will save them all.

name: Air Attack VR
description: Arcade avia/auto simulator. Complete various missions, controlling a fighter in the sky and an armored vehicle on the ground. Win air and ground battles, capture enemy bases, improve available vehicles, and thrive in this action-packed game.

name: Stellaris: First Contact
description: You are not alone! The galaxy is vast and full of wonders, but it’s also full of alien empires you’re going to encounter, whether you’re ready or not. First Contact offers a set of new origins and mechanics that give players the chance to tell stories about their civilizations’ early encounters with visitors from the stars — ones that may not have come in peace!

name: Mad Miner
description: Mad Miner is a mining game where you try to survive in a new order where world life is trapped underground.

name: Toyland Racer
description:
Razer, Spacer, Humpty Dumpty, Tubby and Freddy Banana are five friends organizing a tournament on 10 wacky tracks placed in 5 different worlds, in order to determine who is the fastest inhabitant of their charming world.

The player slips into the role of one of these merry friends. Every driver has a different, fantasy vehicle, which differs in acceleration, traction and weight from the other drivers' cars. Race through lovely hills, villages, and ghostly woods. Collect bonus weapons and options like bombs, rockets, jump, and turbo boost. The physics engine is enabled for crazy stunts and wild crashes.

name: Mr. Tiny Adventures
description: Mr Tiny is a single worker to whom the spell of a witch has caused him to become the size of an insect. Drag your 30 grams of weight through various scenarios, where any single and common object can be a deadly enemy. You need to finish 9 levels of the game to get all the talismans to help you break the spell of the witch and restore your normal size. Mr Tiny, the great lover of beer, is depending on you. Drive through large areas of the kitchen, the pipes, the garden, the street... till the witch house ( your neighbor) Avoid the enemies that come your way, You can kill them as well as jump over them like in other games. Move objects to access to different higher places, which before he had to crouch down to get to. See how you can change the life of a single person in an extreme situation.

name: Crawlspace 2
description: You saw an ad about someone needing help fixing their ventilation system. it sounded easy, but this job was much different then then usual work that you were used to.

name: Elven City Simulator

description: Immortal tales of rebirth is a rogue-like strategy game based on a fantasy world. you will lead your students and female partners for growing to become a legendary master, conquer the giant beasts in the epic but also dangerous world. make your every choice carefully to survive.

name: Digital Exorcist

While everyone is celebrating the coming of the new year 1999, retired Digital Exorcist Sawyer and his computerized partner Tomodachi run into a grisly scene that will make this jaded investigator remember all the old techniques he learned at the agency.

Travel into a world where cyberdemons live all around us in this Adventure Game/Visual Novel inspired by Snatcher and The Silver Case. Do you have what it takes to become a Digital Exorcist?

description: Given Time is a brand new campaign for Jett: The Far Shore available for free on January 31st. This new campaign takes place 3 years after the events of the original campaign's ending. As Mei arises from torpor into a mostly hibernating Ground Control, there are new whispers from the wyld to seek out and unravel, this time, alone.

name: Clash of the Undead
description: Lead the Habitant of Nardia To Defeat The Undead. Clash Of The Undead is a Roguelike Auto Battle Simulator, Where You Fight The Undead Army And Purge Them From The land. Plan your strategy, Use Magic Powers And Recruit New Fighters.

Use your superior deduction skills in this story-driven mystery to help Sherlock deducing his way through an old film studio to finally face his arch nemesis Moriarty. Become a Master of Deduction!

After years of reconstruction, the island nation of Lotte is soon threatened by a darker, more vile threat; one that had been sleeping since the Reaper Wars. Take control of Mathias as he fights for his life against the invading horde in this haunted tower defense game!

Looking for a brand-new horror escape game? Like to compete with horrifying 50 rooms? Halloween escape has got you covered! Join us to enjoy the best-haunted house escape online for free！
The Dark Night Mystery - Find ways to solve mystery puzzles to the escape room plan
Explore the horror hospital, find hidden clues, solve terrifying puzzles, open locks to doors and advance your investigation. The goosebumps game is a mixture of Halloween and scary escape quests.
If you like horror games and creepy adventure experiences – fear room xscape is the game for you!

name: Cathode's Journey
description:
Cathode the TV Cat traverses polychrome fields of light while the Infinite Spiral shifts and twists in endless ways. Dancing in the timeless space around you the Neon Butterfly flirts, ever out of reach, only to transport you to the next level - if you dare!
Cathode's Journey is an experimental audio-visual indie game. There is no distinction between music or sound effect; your actions play a part in a duet, which is also a playful duel. Time and speed is elastic, controlled by how well you manage to collect jewels and avoid obstacles.
